channel.title: Stellar Dawn
channel.description:
:eek: http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/forums.ws?14,15,514,61307723
"Hi everyone,
Following some discussion on these forums, we are happy to confirm that www.stellardawn.com is an official Jagex site which has been launched today.
Whilst we are happy for players to mention this URL on the RuneScape forums, the best place for any specific discussion about the new game, is within the forums located at www.stellardawn.com.
If you choose to visit the new site, you can login using your existing RuneScape account.
Thanks,
=Kathy=" from rs forums

item.title: Stellar Dawn
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“imsokool22, post:5, topic:356692”]i mean incorporating runescape and that name.>.<
rip4d, you fuck off, don’t tell me what to do.
If you were nice like Kohomura, who states the truth, then i might not have sent this message.
stupid fags like you are so annoying i don’t see why you didn’t kill yourself yet?[/quote]I told you to fuck off because you said you’d report the site in his sig to jagex, which was entirely off topic and unneeded.

Read full topic

item.title: Stellar Dawn

item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

imsokool22:

nice siggy might report to jagex.(the whole name is copyright[rune and scape so using either one is illegal])

The Runes of Magic MMO would have been shut down a long time ago if that were the case.
